name: Heat Death (triggthediscovery)
description:
Automation game about trying to stave off the heat death of the universe. Made for LD50.

Controls - 

mouse to select items, click and drag to move inventory items. Scroll wheel to zoom.

"1/2/3" to change game speed

"WASD" to move

"C" to open compendium

"I/Tab" to open personal inventory

"R" to change conveyor belt direction

"Delete" to delete a component
(WARNING: the component will be lost)

"M" to mute the game

Click and drag items from the inventory to place them in the environment
NOTE: this can only be done on the half the screen without an inventory open. Dragging off the sides doesn't work.
